body.p: Dr Sir, My family requires my attention at home so much that I will not be able to attend to other duties, I therefore hereby tender to you my resignation as Colonel elect of the enrolled militia of Adair County accept assurances of my warm friendship for you & beleive me

Your Friend
W C Turk
Adair Co
Resignation of Col. W. C Turk

Filed Apr 1st 1861
accepted
B. Magoffin
Adair Co.
W.C. Turk
Resignation as Col
Accepted & Filed
